properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 24 at 4:28PM AKST until January 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 10
inches possible.

* WHERE...Taiya Inlet, Skagway, and Klondike Highway.

* WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow between Friday evening
and Saturday afternoon will remain below advisory or warning
levels. Another front will bring more heavy snow to the watch
area beginning Saturday evening.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT FOR SKAGWAY AND THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY
